body:
## What's Changed
* Clarify handling exceptions during async events by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/601
* Remove duplicate phrase by @anthonyvdotbe in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/604
* Remove dependency on JTA API by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/609
* Bump nokogiri from 1.13.3 to 1.13.4 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/603
* Remove javadoc dependency on EJB by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/612

## New Contributors
* @anthonyvdotbe made their first contribution in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/604

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/compare/4.0.0...4.0.1

## What's Changed
* Update version to snapshot by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/450
* Add EJB dependency only as JavaDoc dep. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/449
* [Issue-457] Observer resolution - assignability clarification by @gaol in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/458
* Throw an exception without setting configuredProvider to null when ge… by @benjamin-confino in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/462
* Fix XML descriptor in documentation example by @Thihup in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/463
* Refer to Jakarta DI instead of JSR330 by @Cousjava in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/466
* Removal of deprecated bits for next major version by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/473
* Change development version to 4.0.0-SNAPSHOT. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/475
* cdi-468 Split Spec doc to introduce CDI Lite by @antoinesd in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/470
* Draft Lite version of BeanManager. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/471
* initial Build Compatible Extension API proposal by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/451
* Correction to wording of EventMetadata#getInjectionPoint by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/499
* Add getBeanContainer() method to SeContainer for consistency by @graemerocher in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/501
* Create GH actions file by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/503
* Start cleanup of AnnotationTarget by @graemerocher in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/507
* remove App{Archive,ArchiveConfig,Deployment}, rename AppArchiveBuilder and ContextBuilder by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/506
* remove Annotations and add AnnotationBuilder by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/508
* remove AnnotationMember and rename AnnotationMemberValue by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/509
* add SCM info to the POM by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/510
* extension API improvements by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/511
* Make AnnotationLiteral lazy by @graemerocher in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/514
* Cleanup Types interface / add Type.ofClass(String) by @graemerocher in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/513
* Change definitons of explicit/implicit archive, add notion about back… by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/516
* improve extension API documentation and resolve some open questions by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/515
* Initial beans_4_0.xsd by @starksm64 in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/517
* improve extension API documentation and resolve some open questions by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/520
* fix SyntheticObserverBuilder copy&paste mistake by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/522
* Remove TODO referring to singleton as potential bean defining annotat… by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/523
* Replace BeanManager#getEvents with reference to BeanContainer. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/525
* Align wording in unsatisfied and ambig dependencies with that in ambi… by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/526
* Allow using @Priority within stereotypes. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/524
* API changes for allowing @Priority on stereotypes by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/527
* Adjust wording of specification and API around @Priority usage on ste… by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/531
* add BeanConfigurator.priority by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/532
* add specification text for BeanConfigurator.priority by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/533
* improve extension API by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/529
* extension API improvements by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/536
* Programmatic lookup improvements, introduce Handle interface. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/534
* Address the TODO in preface. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/538
* Address TODO in inter-module injection. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/537
* Explicitly state that Java SE impl of CDI has to be Full implementation. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/539
* Decide on other mentions of Full-only concepts in the CDI Lite spec p… by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/541
* Address remaining TODOs for passivation mentions. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/542
* Introduce observable CDI events representing container state. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/543
* improve extension API and resolve all remaining open questions by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/544
* Change BeanManager treatment in CDI Lite by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/547
* CDI Lite packaging, deployment and lifecycle specification by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/546
* Describe in more depth what kind of interception is supported in Lite. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/548
* Change headers and nested lists to markdown syntax. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/550
* Correct the readme url in 2021-10-25-pages-here.md by @starksm64 in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/551
* Remove the notion of version from Packaging and deployment for CDI Full by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/549
* Add a recommendation for bean archive portability between Lite and Full by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/552
* Adjust Handle.get() behavior - throw exception if attempting to get()… by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/555
* Separate the language model to a dedicated module by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/553
* Clarify how conflicting default scopes and priorities on stereotypes work by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/557
* Language model only returns runtime-retained annotations in build compatible extensions by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/554
* Update asciidoc plugins, config by @starksm64 in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/559
* Language model and build compatible extensions API clarifications by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/560
* Fix javadoc by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/561
* Allow @Enhancement to not restrict the types based on annotations by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/566
* Make the return type of Instance.handles() covariant by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/570
* Remove Enhancement.BeanDefiningAnnotations by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/569
* Specify that duplicate type discovery is non-portable by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/571
* Add a blog post on Build Compatible Extensions by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/572
* Specify treatment of invalid @Enhancement and @Registration by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/576
* Add module-info to the api artifacts, update to Java SE 11 by @starksm64 in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/565
* Add ObserverMethod#getDeclaringBean method. by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/578
* Move getInjectableReference method from BeanContainer to BeanManager by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/574
* Move the session scope to CDI Full by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/577
* Add default implementation of OM#getDeclaringBean() by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/579
* Invalid parameter combinations in @Enhancement and @Registration meth… by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/581
* Add explicit notes to APIs that are not required to be present in CDI Lite by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/580
* Change parameter type of SkipIfPortableExtensionPresent from String to Class by @manovotn in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/586
* Update package version by @Emily-Jiang in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/590
* clarify beans.xml handling in CDI Lite by @Ladicek in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/591
* Move to final versions of dependencies for 4.0.0 final by @starksm64 in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/593
* Add a copyright header, #597 by @starksm64 in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/598
* Bump nokogiri from 1.13.1 to 1.13.3 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/596

## New Contributors
* @gaol made their first contribution in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/458
* @benjamin-confino made their first contribution in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/462
* @Thihup made their first contribution in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/463
* @Cousjava made their first contribution in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/466
* @graemerocher made their first contribution in https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/pull/501

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jakartaee/cdi/compare/3.0.0...4.0.0

name: 4.0.0.Alpha1
body:
This is a first version of CDI 4 including removal of deprecated APIs, bits that split the spec to accommodate CDI Lite and build compatible extension SPI.

It is designed mainly as a basis for implementors to test their code against and discover/report needed changes.

name: CDI 2.0.1 release
body: First version with Jakarta EE Gav

name: CDI 2.0.SP1 release
body: CDI version including privileged block to allow CDI to play nice wit security manager
